TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ChannelFactoryBase extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.ChannelManagerBase implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory, class System.ServiceModel.ICommunicationObject
Public MustInherit Class ChannelFactoryBase Inherits ChannelManagerBase Implements IChannelFactory
type ChannelFactoryBase = class inherit ChannelManagerBase interface IChannelFactory interface ICommunicationObject

summary.span: 針對所有自訂通道處理站提供通用基底實作 (Implementation)。

span.span: Provides a common base implementation for all custom channel factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個基底類別 (Base Class) 可建立自訂通道處理站。Use this base class to create a custom channel factory. 類別是衍生自 類別，而且會實作 介面來建立通道。The class derives from the class and implements the interface for creating channels. 這些方法會處理參數驗證，然後委派 (Delegate) 給衍生類別 (Derived Class) 可以覆寫的受保護、虛擬或抽象方法。The methods handle parameter validation and then delegate to protected, virtual or abstract methods that derived classes can override. 每一個受保護的虛擬方法都會自動同步處理 (相對於 介面上的其他方法)，包括狀態轉換方法。Each of the protected virtual methods is automatically synchronized with respect to the other methods on the interface (including the state transition methods). 這表示，不需要額外的鎖定來確定方法主體內的物件處於一致的狀態。This means that no additional locking is required to ensure that the object is in a consistent state inside the method body.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交換訊息時，預設的 建構函式會使用服務模型逾時值來初始化逾時屬性。The default constructor initializes timeout properties with the service model timeout values when exchanging messages. 若是開啟、傳送和關閉作業，預設值為 1 分鐘；若是接收作業，則為 10 分鐘。The default value is 1 minute for open, send, and close operations and 10 minutes for the receive operation. 如果您想要為這些作業逾時指定其他值，請使用 。Use if you want to specify other values for these operation timeouts.

summary.span: 使用指定的預設通訊逾時，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with specified default communication timeouts.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您想要為開啟、傳送、接收和關閉作業逾時指定自訂值，而不要使用服務模型的預設值，請使用 ，而不要使用預設建構函式。Use instead of the default constructor if you want to specify custom values for the open, send, receive, and close operation timeouts instead of using the service model default values.

summary.span: 取得針對要完成之關閉作業所提供的預設時間間隔。

span.span: Gets the default interval of time provided for a close operation to complete.

value.span: 預設 ，指定必須在逾時前多久完成關閉作業。

span.span: The default that specifies how long the close operation has to complete before timing out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當建立新的 物件時，會設定這個值。This value is set when creating a new object. 預設的 建構函式會將 屬性設定為 1 分鐘的值。The default constructor sets the property to a value of 1 minute. 如果您想要為這個逾時指定另一個值，請使用 。Use if you want to specify another value for this timeout.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual T GetProperty<T> () where T : class;
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>() cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) () As T
abstract member GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null) override this.GetProperty : unit -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.

summary.span: 從通道堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有)。

span.span: Returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the channel stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 T (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object T requested if it is present or if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可要求型別物件，例如，用來從通道處理站堆疊中的適當層次設定屬性或取得狀態的介面。Use this to request a typed object such as an interface for setting properties or getting status from the appropriate layer in the channel factory stack. 如果某個層次支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a layer supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不是，則會將呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一層。If not, it simply delegates the call down to the next layer in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何通道處理站層次支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no channel factory layer supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. 這是類似於 COM + 的 QueryService 介面。This is similar to COM+'s QueryService interface.

summary.span: 在通訊物件上插入處理 (當它因為叫用同步中止作業而轉換到關閉狀態之後)。

span.span: Inserts processing on a communication object after it transitions to the closing state due to the invocation of a synchronous abort operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設實作是空的。The default implementation is empty.
